rows.field_418958: A no-code database for e-commerce increases holiday revenues and customer satisfaction.
rows.field_418959:
Today, the makers of a no-code database for e-commerce said that hundreds of online shops using the database saw improvements in revenue over the 2022 holiday season. The "pinnacle" of e-commerce websites may now be created by online retailers without writing a single line of code: a dynamic, database-driven web store that seamlessly interacts with back-office transaction processing and CRM. It also offers similar features for as little as $100 per month, which is less than most organizations pay to run a static website.
Business operations such as product assembly, order fulfillment, inventory, customer relationship management, finance, website management, and e-commerce can now be managed in a unified fashion thanks to the no-code database company. Because it is a web-based service, it eliminates the need for costly hardware purchases and labor-intensive installation procedures.

rows.field_418958: No-Co-SysDB offers fast information sharing between departments, including packaging and shipping and customer relations.
rows.field_418959: In an effort to make shipping administration and order monitoring easier for medium-sized businesses, No-Co-SysDB, the company behind the no-code database, has revealed that their product is the first to directly include PHS Shipping Tools. As a result, we can save money on labor and avoid costly data entry errors, all while providing our customers with complete, real-time visibility into their orders. With this unified offering, you no longer have to manually manage and exchange data between order management, package and shipping, and customer relations systems.

rows.field_418958: With No-Co-SysDB, you can get the features typically found in enterprise-level software at a price more in line with that of mid-market alternatives.
rows.field_418959: For medium-sized businesses, No-Co-SysDB streamlines supply chain and back-office operations. No-Co-SysDB, a provider of supply chain management and e-commerce for medium-sized businesses, has announced the release of a comprehensive back-office application that automates the order, inventory, and procurement phases of business. With No-Co-SysDB, mid-sized businesses can easily and affordably bring data (inventory availability, customer-specific pricing terms, etc.) and processes (order-to-cash, procure-to-pay) from the back office to the Web. This is made possible by the inclusion of fully automatic website generation, website hosting, and e-commerce capabilities. It also helps the company move forward with its plan to tailor its core product offerings to the requirements of particular markets, in this case wholesale and distribution businesses. Last but not least, it offers users adaptable real-time dashboards loaded with current data to aid in making deliberate choices.

rows.field_418804: No-Co-SysDB wins another customer in Chicago
rows.field_418958: Using No-Co-SysDB, HiTechHomeSys was able to increase project installation capacity by 35% without hiring more people and provide faster response times for their customers.
rows.field_418959: Chicago-based HiTechHomeSys, a service provider of home electronic systems such as automated lighting, state-of-the-art home theaters, and security and climate controls, has migrated from the Brand X stand-alone application to No-Co-SysDB. The entire business process at HiTechHomeSys, including but not limited to marketing, sales, support, accounting, and payroll, has been streamlined with the help of No-Co-SysDB. No-Co-SysDB is the most popular suite for small and medium-sized businesses that combines customer relationship management and enterprise resource planning.

rows.field_418804: Mid-sized enterprises save millions of dollars with No-Co-SysDB
rows.field_418958: No-Co-SysDB is a database that helps midsize businesses save millions of dollars.
rows.field_418959:
Midsized companies and divisions of large enterprises have flocked to No-Co-SysDB's online business management solution.

No-Co-SysDB automates key parts of business management for a small fraction of the cost of other solutions.

rows.field_418804: Hundreds More Brand X Customers Switch to No-Co-SysDB
rows.field_418958: No-Co-SysDB said that hundreds of Brand X users switched to its database since February 2022.
rows.field_418959: In a recent press release, No-Co-SysDB boasted that hundreds of Brand X users had made the switch to the company's database since its launch in February 2022. No-Co-SysDB removes the restrictions of Brand X's predetermined migration path by providing a scalable solution that unifies back-office and front-office operations. Businesses have been able to successfully adopt No-Co-SysDB's software thanks to the platform's intuitive interface and assistance with migrating data from the Brand X platform. Brand X users have found it much simpler to learn how to use No-Co-SysDB thanks to the free training sessions offered by No-Co-SysDB.

rows.field_418804: More mid-sized businesses are switching from Brand X to No-Co-SysDB
rows.field_418958: Financial processes, online stores, sales, and customer service are all areas that businesses can automate to save money and reduce stress on employees.
rows.field_418959: Today, No-Co-SysDB, a provider of integrated business management solutions, announced that more midsize companies are migrating to No-Co-SysDB from Brand X. These suites provide e-commerce functionality, CRM (Customer Relationship Management), and ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) to businesses of all sizes. Recent Brand X converts to No-Co-SysDB come from a wide variety of business sectors, including but not limited to the software development industry, manufacturing, and distribution. Many of these businesses cited improvements in usability, a more flexible licensing structure, lower costs, and the ability to more easily integrate ecommerce, enterprise resource planning, and customer relationship management as reasons for making the switch.

rows.field_418958: Write something about the prestigious award that No-Co-SysDB received in the first half of 2022.

rows.field_418804: No-Co-SysDB makes a full end-to-end business and ecommerce solution to help online power sellers grow.
rows.field_418958: This integration gives retailers, wholesalers, and manufacturers using No-Co-SysDB access to a new online sales channel.
rows.field_418959:
The market leader in on-demand business management software, No-Co-SysDB, has announced support for managing online sales directly within the No-Co-SysDB business management application, giving millions of businesses a turnkey answer for selling products online without having to switch to a new system.

With No-Co-SysDB and e-commerce integration, vendors can sell online just as easily as they do on their own sites or through their own sales staff. Accounting, direct sales, inventory, warehouse management, e-mail marketing, and website hosting are just some of the many business processes that can be efficiently managed by the software.

rows.field_418804: 2021 Ends with Big Accounting Prize for No-Co-SysDB
rows.field_418958: No-Co-SysDB is recognized as one of the Top 100 Products for large and medium-sized businesses by Today's Numbers Board.
rows.field_418959: Today's Numbers Board named No-Co-SysDB to its list of the Top 100 Products for 2021 in the "Big Business" category. This is one of several awards No-Co-SysDB received in 2021 for the strength of its integrated suite, which includes enterprise resource planning, customer relationship management software, and ecommerce software.

rows.field_418943:
Working with huge corporations, small businesses, and agencies to create customer-focused copy that increases traffic and increases conversions while also building trust has been a significant part of my job experience as an SEO-trained website copywriter.

As a consequence of my SEO work, many of my clients have seen an increase in traffic, leads, and revenues thanks to their higher Google rankings.

Your website could use a little polish, don't you think?

I've written compelling web copy for more than 30 websites in a variety of fields. Why not take a look at some of the images on my website?

Do you like a more customized approach?

Choosing to work with me means I'll get to know you, your business, and what you stand for. You can't have great content if you don't know your business inside and out. Forget about cookie-cutter marketing.

You've got a product or service that deserves to be seen?

It takes time and effort to build an inspirational brand. Consultations and tone of voice, or branding guidelines, help you stand out from the rest of the pack.
rows.field_418957: Had a few successful copies that helped some organizations.

rows.field_418943:
Hello, my name is Tiff, and I'm an Amsterdam-based German copywriter and content writer. Clients from all over the world rely on me to assist with their German websites so that they can be found by their target audience on Google.

I enjoy writing blog posts, brochures, case studies, SEO copy, websites, and whitepapers.

I've been on the road before.
rows.field_418957: Worked with the team a few years ago.

rows.field_418943:
Here you'll find only the best content. Since 2008, I've been working with technology, consumer, and corporate brands to help them tell better stories through messaging and materials.

If you're looking for help with a strong writer, I'm your guy.

I excel at removing jargon, simplifying technical details, and translating copy into language that the average person can understand.

Through an authentic and heartfelt approach, I connect emotionally with people. Whether I'm working on client video scripts, brand manifestos, or multi-sensory experiences, this is how I approach my work.

As a creative strategist, my services include enhancing media materials with a dash of whimsy, as well as providing strategic and tactical advice on how to best communicate with your target audience.

Blog posts, brochures, case studies, FAQs, e-newsletters, feature articles, position statements, proposals, press releases, speeches, sponsored content, website copy, white papers, video scripts, infographics, explainers, corporate videos, video concepts, and more are some of the things I produce.
rows.field_418946: 1139 Walkers Ridge Way, Burr Ridge, Illinois, 61257
rows.field_418957: Planning to go on vacation next week.

rows.field_418943:
A business can be anything it wants to be in the world of creative copywriting. As an illustration, consider my own company. Not only do I design websites, but I also serve as a guide and instructor to smaller companies as they attempt to navigate the social media maze--making their way to success online by avoiding the sharks (competitors).

Many of us in the creative field of copywriting are tasked with conveying the essence of a company's brand through creative metaphors and storytelling.

While we're on the subject, let me introduce myself. I'm a farmer who also works as a freelance web designer and copywriter. Copy and tenders for the agricultural sector, as well as rural-based businesses, have previously been written by me.

I'm passionate about assisting small businesses in developing cutting-edge content management strategies that delight their target audiences. If my use of unusual metaphors and my narrative style has piqued your interest, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am always happy to talk.

When it comes to writing and public relations, Latosha has a Bachelor of Business Administration as well as eight years of experience in the following fields: IT (Managed Services; cloud computing; cyber security); architecture; design and construction; health and wellness (life coaching; energy healing); and travel.

I graduated in 2012 from the International School of Color and Design, following a creative path.

American House & Garden and Home Ideas Magazine published her as a freelance writer.

In 2014, she began writing about her life for the first time.

Additionally, she owns a health and wellness company online.

Ballroom dancing is Latosha's absolute favorite pastime.

Time constraints, competing priorities, and never-ending meetings are all too common obstacles to getting insights into the hands (or eyes) of your customers.

I can help you unlock the wisdom of your leaders and create content that demonstrates their expertise and strengthens your brand.

All of my work is based on the knowledge of your executives.

Nothing I found on Google, nothing you've heard a million times, nothing I put together.

I cover a wide range of industries in my writing (and am always interested in learning about new ones), but technology is where the majority of my clients are located.

My specialty is writing about how technology can make life easier, and I'm comfortable writing about a wide variety of technologies.

My undergraduate degree is in journalism, and I've worked in marketing for the past nine years. As a result of this unique combination, I've developed the editorial eye for spotting the best angle for your content while also acquiring marketing expertise to effectively promote your brand.

It's a good idea to use a content writer on a part-time basis to supplement your in-house efforts.

Contact me if you're looking for a content writer who can tap into your experts' knowledge.

My name is Julie. As a content strategist for B2B companies, I assist them in achieving their goals through strategic content creation.

Companies like AmRicoh, AmPost, and ProspecUS have entrusted me with their copy and content projects. It's possible for you to do so as well.

This is what I do: identify and close content gaps across platforms; determine the brand's voice; get a handle on data-driven content marketing; integrate your content across all stages of the sales process; make sure you're focusing on the right people at the right time; rebuild already-existing websites or start from scratch; and, create content hubs that satisfy both your customers and your search engine optimization goals.

For UX, IA, or customer research projects, you'd benefit from hiring a copywriter who also has a strategic mindset.

I am open to long-term content contracts with reputable clients.

Customer service is a top priority for me, so yes, I do speak up.

I'm an expert in the following areas:
- Content strategy
- Tone of voice development
- SEO website copywriting
- Ongoing content hubs
- Case studies
- Email marketing
- Whitepapers and thought leadership
- Corporate communication and reporting

Let's talk.
rows.field_418957: Submitted a couple of projects last week.

rows.field_418943:
When it comes to their website content, copywriting, and business operations, I assist business owners that are pressed for time.

My experience is in IT operations and project management, and the areas in which I specialize are as follows: business processes; service management procedures (ITIL); business requirements; user manuals; and technical documentation.

I am a member of an eCommerce group, and one of my specialties is assisting company owners by producing keyword-optimized product descriptions for EStoreUS products that fall under a wide variety of categories.

Because I am also a seller, I am familiar with the search engines and listing policies used by EStoreUS, and I am also familiar with the subtleties involved in the behavior of online customers.
rows.field_418946: 1967 Deer Haven Drive, Pendleton, South Carolina, 29670
rows.field_418957: Left a few projects for editing.
Charged a bit over the budget.

rows.field_418943:
Tom is my name.

In order to help businesses stand out and connect with their potential customers, I write SEO-friendly copy.

The majority of the time, I try to keep things light, friendly, and conversational.

There's no nonsense or hyped-up filler here.

There's nothing in-depth or tedious here. All you need is clear, concise content that both your clients and Google will eat up.

As a writer and teacher, I help training and education organizations create unique brands that attract the students they want to work with.

The content I create for SEO, branding, curriculum, and training is used by a wide range of educational and training organizations of all sizes. For nearly a decade, I've worked in the field of education and training. The content on my website, which is in plain English, is easy to find, and the application process itself is straightforward. Making government regulations and requirements understandable to an ESL audience of migration agents, applicants, and international students is critical.

To date, I've worked with small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), curriculum development organizations, independent trainers, and non-profit organizations (NFPs) as a freelance copywriter.

Let's set up a time to talk and see if we can collaborate if you're looking for a copywriter who enjoys the process of writing.
rows.field_418946: 3356 Sunny Day Drive, Santa Ana, California, 92701
